comments.author: vexx32
comments.body:
This comment shows the need for this: https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/13660#issuecomment-699669594

Basically it forces the json to a "flat" object. There's no reason _not_ to allow this, and although it may be considered edge case for some, I see no reason to force folks to find weird workaround when we can just fix it. 🙂
